donate-now:errorMessage: The service is temporarily unavailable, please try later
donate-now:chooseFrequency: You can make a one-time donation or a monthly donation.
donate-now:storageDisclaimer: SuttaCentral does not handle or store your credit card details. All credit card transactions are handled securely by Stripe.
donate-now:feeDisclaimer: The Stripe handling fee deducted from a donation is 1.75% + 30¢ for Australian cards, and 2.9% + 30¢ for International cards, plus a 1.8% currency conversion fee when applicable.
donate-now:paymentSuccessful: Sadhu! Your payment has been completed successfully.
donate-now:redirectNotice: You will be redirected to the homepage in 5 seconds.
donate-now:AmountCannotBeLessThan: Amount cannot be less than $0.50 USD.
donate-now:StripeLimitations: Due to Stripe limitations,  please make a direct payment, or else contact us for help.
